description:

In general, Adlercreutzia is a genus of bacteria that belong to the phylum Firmicutes. Bacteria in this genus are typically anaerobic, Gram-positive, and rod-shaped. They have been isolated from various human and animal gut microbiome samples.

Without access to the original scientific literature describing the isolation and characterization of Adlercreutzia shanghongiae, I cannot confidently provide a more comprehensive scientific description of this particular species.
